哥斯達不受重用但又未能離隊，他曾直言自己在隊內似囚犯。這名西班牙國腳又指自己人緣不俗，連前領隊摩連奴亦有致電關心他：「摩連奴有直接打結我，看看我是否安好，又祝我一切順利。我跟他關係一直很好，彼此沒有矛盾。他離開車路士時大家都很難過。」

除了摩連奴外，哥斯達又指自己亦獲隊友支持：「當領隊不要你，你只好走人。我之前在隊內很開心，你可以問問眾隊友。他們有傳短訊說很掛念我。」

Chelsea and Antonio Conte split over targets

Antonio Conte is in a stand-off with the Chelsea hierarchy over transfer targets, with the club reluctant to bow to the manager’s request to spend significant sums of money on experienced players with little resale value.

In addition to personal tension between Conte and some Chelsea staff brought about by what is perceived as his incessant demands, it is understood that there is also a philosophical difference between the Italian and the club as they seek to overhaul their squad.

Senior Chelsea sources have told The Times that while Conte is concerned only with assembling a squad capable of competing in the Premier League and Champions League this season, the board have a responsibility to plan for the medium and long term.

Antonio Conte is in a stand-off with the Chelsea hierarchy over transfer targets, with the club reluctant to bow to the manager’s request to spend significant sums of money on experienced players with little resale value.

In addition to personal tension between Conte and some Chelsea staff brought about by what is perceived as his incessant demands, it is understood that there is also a philosophical difference between the Italian and the club as they seek to overhaul their squad.

《泰晤士報》報道，車路士主帥干地和球會高層在轉會問題上陷入僵局，球會不願滿足干地花高價錢引進經驗豐富但轉手價值較低的球員的要求。

資深車路士消息源透露，干地正在擔心球隊的陣容能否在歐冠和聯賽中競爭，但球會高層有責任為中長期規劃做打算，而干地對此不怎麼感興趣。

干地目前的目標為：32歲的史雲斯前鋒洛蘭迪、28歲的國米翼鋒佩利錫，30歲的國米翼鋒簡達華、26歲的祖雲達斯邊後衛阿歷士辛度和26歲的修咸頓中堅雲迪克。

車路士在今夏的轉會窗簽下了卡巴尼路、莫拉達、魯迪加和巴卡約高以表達對干地的支持，而其中三人都在24歲以下，35歲的卡巴尼路則是自由加盟。

車路士近兩個月在引進阿歷士辛度和雲迪克時進展緩慢，他們兩人都為26歲，車路士擔心他們是否值得付出的轉會費。藍軍更青睞引進有升值或保值能力的球員，如簽下20歲的奧斯卡，然後將他以4100萬英鎊出售。

干地曾在近兩個轉會窗要求球會引進祖雲達斯中堅邦路斯，但車路士拒絕認真追求他。這也是干地為何今夏只與車路士重簽兩年合同的原因，而非球會提供給他的4年合同。

車路士還對干地給青訓球員的上場時間和機會失望——儘管干地在上任時就被告知青訓發展也是他的一項重要工作——車路士今夏只能出售或出租多名年輕球員。

儘管如此，車路士並不感到震驚。他們知道干地在祖雲達斯期間每個賽季都是如此，但他也帶隊奪得了聯賽三連冠。

車路士在今夏的轉會窗簽下了卡巴尼路、莫拉達、魯迪加和巴卡約高以表達對干地的支持，而其中三人都在24歲以下，35歲的卡巴尼路則是自由加盟。

車路士近兩個月在引進阿歷士辛度和雲迪克時進展緩慢，他們兩人都為26歲，車路士擔心他們是否值得付出的轉會費。藍軍更青睞引進有升值或保值能力的球員，如簽下20歲的奧斯卡，然後將他以4100萬英鎊出售。

干地曾在近兩個轉會窗要求球會引進祖雲達斯中堅邦路斯，但車路士拒絕認真追求他。這也是干地為何今夏只與車路士重簽兩年合同的原因，而非球會提供給他的4年合同。

車路士還對干地給青訓球員的上場時間和機會失望——儘管干地在上任時就被告知青訓發展也是他的一項重要工作——車路士今夏只能出售或出租多名年輕球員。

儘管如此，車路士並不感到震驚。他們知道干地在祖雲達斯期間每個賽季都是如此，但他也帶隊奪得了聯賽三連冠。

Tottenham have all but agreed terms with Paris Saint-Germain defender Serge Aurier but Chelsea are ready to hijack the deal, according to French publication L’Equipe.

The newspaper claim the 24-year-old right-back has reached a 95 per cent agreement with Spurs on the terms of a contract and, once they are settled, Tottenham chairman Daniel Levy will begin negotiations with PSG over signing Aurier for around £23million.

L’Equipe report that the north Londoners are in pole position to sign the defender but Chelsea lie in ambush and are prepared to hijack their bitter rivals’ deal.

Good move for Tottenham?

Not necessarily. Sure, Aurier has pedigree, valuable Champions League experience and is used to life at a big club where there is pressure to win twice a week. But the Ivory Coast also has a reputation as a troublemaker with an attitude problem. He has landed himself in hot water a few times at PSG and there is a sense that the French big hitters would gladly be rid of him. If Mauricio Pochettino is convinced that Aurier’s problems are behind him and he has matured, then this could be a decent piece of business, as Tottenham are in need of a new right-back following the £50million sale of Kyle Walker to Manchester City. But that is a big ‘if’.

This Is Futbol rating: 5/10

Likely to happen?

The words ‘Chelsea’ and ‘hijack’ in the same sentence will fill the Spurs faithful with dread. They will remember all too well that Willian was on the verge of joining before a late U-turn led him to Stamford Bridge. Back when Harry Redknapp was manager, Tottenham were also on the verge of signing Eden Hazard. We all know what happened there. Chelsea have deeper pockets than Spurs and the lustre that comes with regular trophies. It appears there is some way to go before Tottenham sign Aurier.

Chelsea have turned their attention to Southampton’s Cedric Soares as they attempt to sign at least three new players before the transfer window closes.

The 25-year-old Portuguese international has been monitored by Chelsea for some time as is regarded as an ideal addition to their squad. Cedric can play at right-back or right wing-back and would give Chelsea options, tactically, as well as provide strong competition for Victor Moses.

Chelsea have been attempting to sign Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain from Arsenal and have also considered moves for Serge Aurier, who has been put up for sale by Paris Saint-Germain, or Valencia’s full-back Joao Cancelo as they try and improve the right-hand side of their team.

Cedric would appear to be a cheaper option than those other three players and while Chelsea have not made a formal offer, as yet, it is unlikely that they would be offering more than £15million for the defender who was signed from Sporting in 2015 for £4.7million on a four-year deal.

Cedric has performed well at Southampton and was part of the Portugal squad that won Euro 2016 and has been linked with a move, also, to Barcelona. It remains to be seen whether Southampton, who still have to resolve the future of Virgil Van Dijk after he submitted a transfer request, with Chelsea also among the clubs registering an interest in him, would countenance selling the player.

韋利安雖然無法像夏薩特那樣，成為一支冠軍隊的進攻核心，通過出色的表現來決定球隊上限，但正是因為威廉的存在，車路士的實力（下限）才不會低到哪去，他能夠在夏薩特無法出場時保證球隊的進攻火力，驅動球隊進攻或是直接入球決定比賽。賽季結束後，摩連奴執掌的曼聯曾希望求購韋利安，但車路士根本無意出售這位巴西球星，韋利安對藍軍的重要性是不言而喻的。如今，車路士又有幸福的煩惱，干地在世界盃年到來之際該如何使用夏薩特和韋利安這兩大王牌呢？我們拭目以待。
